name: Mimi the Cat - New Friends
description:
Mimi the Cat - New Friends is a sokoban-style game where you can push boxes, stack boxes, and even jump between platforms, so that the lovely little cat Mimi can have her well-deserved rest in her bed.


Pay close attention to the environment! Throughout the game, you will have the opportunity to unlock a new adorable cat or continue to the next levels.


You can choose to play with the unlocked kitten instead of Mimi.


There is no time limit or resources to manage, so you can calmly focus on solving the challenges.

Features:
  • 50 handcrafted levels.
  • A tip on how many boxes are needed.


  • Jump between platforms, like a good cat would.


  • Unlock new kittens.
  • Stack boxes.
  • Minimalist interface and gameplay.
  • Restart level.
  • Catchy soundtrack.
  • Choose another kitten to play.
  • Fun and sweet sokoban with relaxing.
  • Mimi, Branquinho, Nevezinho, Melzinha, Cinzendo, Negan, are here to warm your heart ♥
